db:abstract.db:para: The Qt GRPC module provides support for communicating with gRPC services.
This module is in Technical Preview state.
This module was introduced in Qt 6.5.

db:article.db:para: The Qt GRPC module provides support for communicating with gRPC services.
This module is in Technical Preview state.
This module was introduced in Qt 6.5.

db:listitem.db:para: The QAbstractGrpcChannel class is interface that represents common gRPC channel functionality.
The QAbstractGrpcClient class is bridge between gRPC clients and channels.
The QGrpcCallOptions is an storage class used to set additional call options.
The QGrpcCallReply class contains data for asynchronous call of gRPC client API.
The QGrpcChannel class is a gRPC-cpp native api implementation of QAbstractGrpcChannel interface.
The QGrpcChannelOptions is an storage class used to set additional channel options.
The QGrpcHttp2Channel class is an HTTP/2 implementation of QAbstractGrpcChannel interface.
The QGrpcOperation class implements common logic to handle communication in Grpc channel.
The QGrpcStatus class contains information about last gRPC operation.
The QGrpcStream class implements logic to handle stream communication in the Grpc channel.
